Commentary: Steyn spears his first ball down towards leg stump, there's not a great deal of outswing and he's flicked down to fine leg
banged in outside off by Steyn, but Tharanga mistimes a chopped cut. It looks a slow track
floated fuller by Steyn, and Tharanga misses with an airy drive
punched smartly through cover by Tharanga, the ball sitting up off a length
and now another miss outside off as Steyn keeps the ball in the channel and Tharanga pokes outside off
Tharanga's forward to a full delivery slanted across him, checking a drive to cover
and he starts on a length, Avishka nudging defensively into the leg side
Commentary_short: Ngidi to WIA Fernando, no run

Commentary: Avishka steps half forward, pushing to point on the up
Commentary_short: Ngidi to WIA Fernando, no run

Commentary: laced through point by Avishka. The contact between bat and ball was met with a resounding crack as he slapped it crisply, on the up once again
Commentary_short: Ngidi to WIA Fernando, FOUR runs

Commentary: a touch of shape in through the air as Ngidi straightens his line, Avishka defending
Commentary_short: Ngidi to WIA Fernando, no run

Commentary: punched firmly, but straight to point, who is quite close in
Commentary_short: Ngidi to WIA Fernando, no run

Commentary: quick out of the hand at 141km/h, but even quicker off the bat! Avishka just stood up on a rising cross-seamed delivery and forced it away backward of point. This pitch looks a belter
Commentary_short: Ngidi to WIA Fernando, FOUR runs

Commentary: caught by Shamsi at mid on! Steyn pulled his length back and despite the slow track, Tharanga found himself in an awkward position as he tried to pull, splicing the ball straight up. It wasn't really short enough for the shot. Shamsi settled himself under the high chance, and Steyn has taken seven balls to break through on his return to the one-day set-up
Dismissal_text: WU Tharanga c Shamsi b Steyn 4 (10m 6b 1x4 0x6) SR: 66.66

Commentary: Steyn pitches it up, with a hint of wobble, but it's a little too straight and he's nudged to midwicket
Commentary_short: Steyn to WIA Fernando, no run

Commentary: short, and bowled at just 130km/h. It sits up and Avishka dispatches a powerful pull
Commentary_short: Steyn to WIA Fernando, FOUR runs

Commentary: on a length, aimed at middle and off, and it's met with solid defence
Commentary_short: Steyn to WIA Fernando, no run

Commentary: oh dear, some messy fielding from Shamsi, who just took a catch but now dives over the top as a push to mid off, the ball slipping right under him, to give away some runs
pitched right up and honing in on off stump to test Avishka's defence
Commentary_short: Steyn to WIA Fernando, no run

Commentary: Ngidi pitches it up, Oshada driving to mid off
Commentary_short: Ngidi to BOP Fernando, no run

Commentary: angled in towards off stump at 141km/h, but Oshada keeps it out well enough
Commentary_short: Ngidi to BOP Fernando, no run

Commentary: nicely accurate from Ngidi, who keeps it in the channel and keeps Oshada defending
Commentary_short: Ngidi to BOP Fernando, no run

Commentary: patience brings a wicket! Ngidi just continued to plug away on or around off stump, and Oshada flashes outside off to place an edge in Reeza's hands at first slip. It was accuracy and a hint of extra bounce that did him in
Dismissal_text: BOP Fernando c Hendricks b Ngidi 0 (7m 4b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00

Commentary: Ngidi keeps it tight on off stump, Mendis defending
Commentary_short: Ngidi to BKG Mendis, no run

Commentary: left alone outside off, and there some howls of excitement from behind the stumps as the ball seams sharply in. It looked close, but with the bounce Ngidi is finding, he was safe
Commentary_short: Ngidi to BKG Mendis, no run

Commentary: goodness me, Steyn hurls one down the leg side and the ball bounces well in front of de Kock, slipping through his gloves
closer to off stump this time, and he's forward to defend
Commentary_short: Steyn to WIA Fernando, no run

Commentary: a touch of extra vim in this one at 139km/h, and it's left alone outside off
nice shape from Steyn, angling in and swinging away outside off. Steyn's got the ball moving now
Commentary_short: Steyn to BKG Mendis, no run

Commentary: sliced down to third man, and Nortje puts in a dive to stop the boundary
Commentary_short: Steyn to BKG Mendis, no run

Commentary: straighter this time, and he's forward to defend

Commentary_short: Steyn to BKG Mendis, no run
Ngidi to WIA Fernando, no run

Commentary: dug in short at 144km/h, but it's met with a well-controlled pull, Avishka rolling his wrists over the rising ball
Commentary_short: Ngidi to WIA Fernando, FOUR runs

Commentary: Ngidi finds some lift outside off, Avishka guiding to third man
Kusal hops on a back of a length delivery, chopping to gully
Commentary_short: Ngidi to BKG Mendis, no run

Commentary: good line! This has been a bristling opening spell from Ngidi, who's kept the ball up around 140km/h, and bursts this one past Kusal's outside edge
Commentary_short: Ngidi to BKG Mendis, no run

Commentary: a touch straighter, and it's defended off the splice
Commentary_short: Ngidi to BKG Mendis, no run

Commentary: a hint of wobble for Steyn as he really holds this one back at 124km/h. Avishka defends
Commentary_short: Steyn to WIA Fernando, no run

Commentary: rising outside off, and he's guided down to third man
Steyn works up a little steam, pushing this one through at 140km/h, but it's wide enough outside off that it can be safely left alone
Commentary_short: Steyn to BKG Mendis, no run

Commentary: beaten outside off, Kusal flinging his hands through a wild drive at an outswinger
Commentary_short: Steyn to BKG Mendis, no run

Commentary: Steyn aims a full delivery at off stump, Kusal driving to mid on
Commentary_short: Steyn to BKG Mendis, no run

Commentary: Steyn finds a little lift outside off, but it's easily dealt with as Kusal presses to point
Commentary_short: Steyn to BKG Mendis, no run

Commentary: Ngidi's good work continues as he hits a length at 142km/h to keep Avishka honest
Commentary_short: Ngidi to WIA Fernando, no run

Commentary: a touch straighter, and he's tucked square
worked off the hip, Phehlukwayo stopping it close to square leg
Avishka almost slips as he over-balances nudging a straight one to leg, but he recovers quickly enough to take the single
a ramped uppercut causes some excitement in the slips, but it's easily over them and stopped at third man
Avishka presses his weight forward and punches to point, but his shot finds the field
Commentary_short: Ngidi to WIA Fernando, no run

Commentary: shaping in towards his pads, and he's glanced to leg
on a length and straight at 138km/h, Avishka pushing to mid on
Commentary_short: Nortje to WIA Fernando, no run

Commentary: a little quicker through the air at 143km/h, and Avishka finds a single into the leg side

Commentary_short: Nortje to BKG Mendis, no run

Commentary: Nortje's length is too full, his line is drifting in towards the pads, and Kusal holds his balance to slot a boundary through midwicket
Commentary_short: Nortje to BKG Mendis, FOUR runs

Commentary: a touch too straight again, and he's milked for a leg-side single
and he continues in much the same vein, pushing the ball into the channel outside off
Commentary_short: Ngidi to BKG Mendis, no run

Commentary: a little shorter, and Kusal rides the bounce to guide to gully
Commentary_short: Ngidi to BKG Mendis, no run

Commentary: tight on off stump at 140km/h, Kusal defends
Commentary_short: Ngidi to BKG Mendis, no run

Commentary: and now this one holds its line outside off to fizz past the outside edge. It was the cross-seamed delivery
Commentary_short: Ngidi to BKG Mendis, no run

Commentary: angled down to third man for one
pulled high and wide over midwicket! The first really bad ball Ngidi has bowled, digging it in but aiming too leg side
Commentary_short: Ngidi to WIA Fernando, FOUR runs

Commentary: Nortje starts this over with some line and length at 143km/h, Kusal pressing half forward to defend
Commentary_short: Nortje to BKG Mendis, no run

Commentary: this one slips down the leg side and is called wide
that's a much better line, just outside off, and the ball comes off the outer half of the bat on its way to third man
caught off a short-arm jab! Nortje pulled his length back a little, Avishka was rushed into a pull, and the ball is spliced straight to short midwicket
Dismissal_text: WIA Fernando c Duminy b Nortje 29 (50m 27b 5x4 0x6) SR: 107.40

Commentary: and he's gone first ball! Nortje gets a delivery to burst off a length down the leg side, the ball kissing the gloves as Primayal tries to glance and de Kock diving to catch it. Primayal's out to his first ball in international cricket, and Nortje's on a hat-trick
Dismissal_text: PARP Perera c †de Kock b Nortje 0 (2m 1b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00

Commentary: well, his hat-trick ball is short again, and rising over leg stump as Kamindu ducks under it
Commentary_short: Nortje to PHKD Mendis, no run

Commentary: angled across him, on a length at 145km/h, and Kamindu defends
Commentary_short: Nortje to PHKD Mendis, no run

Commentary: Kusal is up on his toes to guide a back of a length delivery down to third man and turn the strike over
flicked off the pads, but straight to midwicket
Commentary_short: Phehlukwayo to PHKD Mendis, no run

Commentary: he's off the mark with a glance down to fine leg
and Steyn has more work to do down at third man, keeping them to a single
pushed across him at 134km/h, and it's chopped to gully
Commentary_short: Phehlukwayo to PHKD Mendis, no run

Commentary: Phehlukwayo keeps the ball short of a drivable length, and it's punched to cover
Commentary_short: Phehlukwayo to PHKD Mendis, no run

Commentary: pushed through on a length, outside off, and Kusal lets this one go
Commentary_short: Nortje to BKG Mendis, no run

Commentary: angled down to third man, another single the result
on the drive to mid off
Commentary_short: Nortje to PHKD Mendis, no run

Commentary: on the drive, but straight to mid off
Commentary_short: Nortje to PHKD Mendis, no run

Commentary: dug in short on middle and leg, Kamindu ducking under it
Commentary_short: Nortje to PHKD Mendis, no run

Commentary: but it doesn't make a difference as he threads a gap at cover with another drive, pushing hard for the second
very full and slanted in towards off stump, Kusal watchfully forward to meet it
Commentary_short: Phehlukwayo to BKG Mendis, no run

Commentary: and he's forward again, driving this time but finding mid on
Commentary_short: Phehlukwayo to BKG Mendis, no run

Commentary: Phehlukwayo tests Kusal with a short one, but he's equal to it and rolls his wrists on a pull to get the ball out to deep square
a firm drive finds the fielder at cover
Commentary_short: Phehlukwayo to PHKD Mendis, no run

Commentary: slugged through midwicket! Kamindu breaks the shackles by waiting deep in the crease on a back-of-a-length delivery, picking it up in the air but through the gap wide of mid on
Commentary_short: Phehlukwayo to PHKD Mendis, FOUR runs

Commentary: Phehlukwayo aims fuller and wider of off, and this one is left alone
Commentary_short: Phehlukwayo to PHKD Mendis, no run

Commentary: chopped down through gully, just the one
Kamindu buckles his knees as a short one rises over him
Commentary_short: Nortje to PHKD Mendis, no run

Commentary: nice and tight on off stump at 142km/h, and it's met with solid defence
Commentary_short: Nortje to PHKD Mendis, no run

Commentary: nicely bowled by Nortje, who hits a length and gives Kamindu nothing to work with
Commentary_short: Nortje to PHKD Mendis, no run

Commentary: Kamindu nails a neat little backfoot punch, but it's intercepted by a diving point fielder
Commentary_short: Nortje to PHKD Mendis, no run

Commentary: shortish again, and Kamindu drops his hands to let the ball pass him
Commentary_short: Nortje to PHKD Mendis, no run

Commentary: length ball outside off, and angling in. He chops this down to third man off the back foot for a walking single
length ball outside off, and angling across. He walks across to cut, and slapped to point
left alone! Full and wide outside off, but Mendis chooses to shoulder his arms
Commentary_short: Phehlukwayo to BKG Mendis, no run

Commentary: length ball angling into his body, and he swivels to pull. Straight to Steyn at fine leg
length ball just outside leg, and he attempts a clip behind square. Hits his thigh-guard and rolls away to square leg
Commentary_short: Phehlukwayo to PHKD Mendis, 1 leg bye

Commentary: length ball, wide outside off, and cut firmly to point. But Markram drives sideways with his right-hand stretched, and he stops a certain four!
Commentary_short: Phehlukwayo to BKG Mendis, no run

Commentary: length ball going across Kamindu, and he punches off the back foot past cover
length ball on middle, and nudged off his pads to square leg
back of a length on off, and he sways away from the ball's line
Commentary_short: Nortje to PHKD Mendis, no run

Commentary: full on middle, and tapped off the back foot to cover. Stopped inside the circle
Commentary_short: Nortje to PHKD Mendis, no run

Commentary: full just outside off, and he prods forward to push. Struck to mid-off
Commentary_short: Nortje to PHKD Mendis, no run

Commentary: that's his third! Back of a length on off, and he shapes up to cut. Ball bounces just a bit extra, and he's top-edged this to the keeper
Dismissal_text: PHKD Mendis c †de Kock b Nortje 9 (29m 25b 1x4 0x6) SR: 36.00

Commentary: full and angling into off stump. Defended off the front foot
Commentary_short: Phehlukwayo to BKG Mendis, no run

Commentary: length ball on off, and he rides the bounce to pull along the ground
full and wide outside off, and he slashes a cover drive down to third man!
taken at fine leg! Back of a length on middle, and cramping Mendis for space. Tries to pull, but the top edge goes right into the air. Comfortably taken near the boundary
Dismissal_text: BKG Mendis c Nortje b Phehlukwayo 21 (68m 42b 1x4 0x6) SR: 50.00

Commentary: full and wide outside off, and Thisara stretches to meet the ball. Cut away to deep point
full just outside off, and the attempted straight drive is mistimed to mid-off
Commentary_short: Phehlukwayo to de Silva, no run

Commentary: full on middle, and he pushes forward to tap a drive to cover. Intercepted by the outfielder running in
length ball, angling across, and Thisara can't connect with the cut. Through to the keeper
Commentary_short: Nortje to NLTC Perera, no run

Commentary: back of a length on off, and he tries to pull over midwicket. Just about manages to clear Faf as he slices that shot
back of a length on leg, and he rides the bounce to fend off the back foot
Commentary_short: Nortje to NLTC Perera, no run

Commentary: length ball on off, and the inside-out punched shot goes to the right of mid-off
Commentary_short: Nortje to NLTC Perera, no run

Commentary: length ball, just wide outside off,  and the attempted punch to cover is mistimed towards the off side
Commentary_short: Nortje to NLTC Perera, no run

Commentary: back of a length, just outside off, and he rides the bounce to block off the back foot
Commentary_short: Phehlukwayo to de Silva, no run

Commentary: full on off, and he takes a tiny step forward to block off the front foot
Commentary_short: Phehlukwayo to de Silva, no run

Commentary: length ball on leg, and the attempted flick to fine leg goes past his outside edge. Wide called by the umpire
length ball, wide outside off but stays low. Through to QdK on the bounce
Commentary_short: Phehlukwayo to de Silva, no run

Commentary: length ball angling across his body again. The natural angle of the bowler takes it down the leg side again
overpitched on off, and he does well to drive this down to mid-on
Commentary_short: Phehlukwayo to de Silva, no run
Phehlukwayo to de Silva, no run

Commentary: length ball on off, and nudged off his body to deep square leg off the back foot. A walking single for the two men
length ball on leg stump, but spinning further down leg. Wayward first delivery from Shamsi
full on middle, and turning into leg stump. Driven down the ground to long on
cross seam, full outside off, and spinning away from Perera. He prods forward to defend, but plays down the wrong line
Commentary_short: Shamsi to NLTC Perera, no run

Commentary: full just outside off, and driven to cover for a single
full outside off, and the googly is dragged straight back to the bowler. Mistimed off the bat's inside half
Commentary_short: Shamsi to de Silva, no run

Commentary: full on middle, and nice drift on offer from Shamsi. Accurate near the batsman's toes, and defended towards the leg side
Commentary_short: Shamsi to de Silva, no run

Commentary: flighted full on middle, and firmly struck past the bowler's right to long-on
length ball, right on the money first ball. Right on off stump, and he tiptoes to defend off the back foot
Commentary_short: Steyn to de Silva, no run

Commentary: length ball, just outside off stump, and punched off the back foot to cover
Commentary_short: Steyn to de Silva, no run

Commentary: full on his pads, and flicked in front of square! Good use of the wrists, and Phehlukwayo near the boundary can't cut it off
Commentary_short: Steyn to de Silva, FOUR runs

Commentary: length ball on off stump, and blocked off the back foot towards cover
Commentary_short: Steyn to de Silva, no run

Commentary: back of a length, wide outside off, and tapped off the back foot to mid-off
Commentary_short: Steyn to de Silva, no run

Commentary: back of a length on the fourth-stump line, and he rides the bounce to fend off the back foot. With the bat's straight face
Commentary_short: Steyn to de Silva, no run

Commentary: full on off, and turning away from Thisara. Tapped away to cover
Commentary_short: Shamsi to NLTC Perera, no run

Commentary: full just outside off, and drilled down to long off for a single
tossed up on off stump, and he skips down the ground to drive. Shamsi dives to his left to intercept
Commentary_short: Shamsi to de Silva, no run

Commentary: full just outside off, and played with the bat's open face to the vacant point region. They scamper across for one
googly! Length ball, wide outside of, but turning inwards. Cramps Thisara for room, but he cuts behind square anyway. Chase for the man at deep extra cover
full just outside off, and caressed back to the bowler off the front foot
Commentary_short: Shamsi to de Silva, no run

Commentary: full on off, and he tries to drive through the covers. Ball flies off his outside edge to deep point instead. The cameraman had no idea where that went!
length ball, wide outside off and he slaps this straight to Miller at short cover
Commentary_short: Steyn to de Silva, no run

Commentary: a bit of swing! Full just outside off, and moving away from the batsman. He pushes forward to drive, but finds the man at mid-off
Commentary_short: Steyn to de Silva, no run

Commentary: full on off, and worked off his pads to the leg side. Short midwicket cleans up
Commentary_short: Steyn to de Silva, no run

Commentary: length ball on off stump, and fended off the back foot to Steyn
Commentary_short: Steyn to de Silva, no run

Commentary: back of a length, wide outside off, and pulled off the back foot to deep midwicket
full on off, and turning into the batsman. Struck firmly down the ground to long on
full on middle, and he drives down the ground. Stopped by Shamsi diving to his right
Commentary_short: Shamsi to NLTC Perera, no run

Commentary: full just outside off, and driven with the bat's open face to deep extra cover
length ball on off, and he flicks off his hips to deep backward square
full just outside off, and turning away from Thisara. Driven to right left of cover
Commentary_short: Shamsi to NLTC Perera, no run

Commentary: caught-and-bowled! Full on off, and turning away from the batsman. Tries to nudge towards cover, but a leading edge takes it back to Shamsi. He dives forward and takes a superb catch that was dying on him
Dismissal_text: NLTC Perera c & b Shamsi 12 (29m 17b 0x4 0x6) SR: 70.58

Commentary: angling in, and worked off his hips to the leg side
back of a length, wide outside off, and he sways away from the line of the ball
length ball, just wide outside off, and steered off the front foot to cover
full just outside off, and guided off the front foot to extra cover. Markram gives the ball a chase and parries back from just inside the boundary. Excellent effort
low full toss wide outside off, and the attempted drive is inside edged to square leg
yorker, on off stump, and he digs it away to cover
Commentary_short: Steyn to de Silva, no run

Commentary: full on off, and spinning inwards. Driven to long on
full on leg, and tapped away to midwicket with soft hands for a quick single
full on leg, and worked away to deep midwicket
googly! Full on off, and turning right across the batsman's attempted drive. Past his outside edge to QdK
full on middle, and nudged off his toes to the leg side
length ball, on off stump, and he runs a late cut down to the vacant third-man region. Man from point gives the ball a chase
full outside off, and turning inwards. Defended off the front foot
length ball on middle, and turning into his pads. Nudged off his pads to square leg
length ball on middle, and turning inwards again. Nudged off his hips to the leg side
length ball, wide outside off, and spinning inwards. Carved off the back foot
length ball on off, and flicked off his pads to deep backward square
length ball on off, and he carves a back-foot shot to point
length ball on middle, and spinning into his pads. Flicked off his hips to square leg
Commentary_short: Shamsi to de Silva, no run

Commentary: flighted on leg, and he skips down the wicket to crunch a drive to mid-on
Commentary_short: Shamsi to de Silva, no run

Commentary: full on off, and drills a straight drive to long on
full just outside off, and turning inwards. The attempted cover drive is inside-edged to the leg side
full on off, and he hammers a straight drive to long on for a single
full on leg, and flicked off his pads to midwicket
Commentary_short: Shamsi to de Silva, no run

Commentary: full just outside off, and he drills a straight drive over mid-off! Races away to the boundary
full outside off, and carved away to deep point
length ball on off, and turning into his pads. Nudged off the hips to deep square leg for a single
length ball on leg stump, and he gloves this away to the leg side
full on off, and nudged away to square leg
full on off, and defended off the front foot
length ball on leg, and cramping the batsman for room. Tries to defend, but the ball nearly skids onto his stumps. Eventually under-edged onto his boots
Commentary_short: Shamsi to de Silva, no run

Commentary: full just outside off, and defended with soft hands towards cover
Commentary_short: Shamsi to de Silva, no run

Commentary: full just outside off, and driven away from his body to cover
Commentary_short: Shamsi to de Silva, no run

Commentary: length ball on middle, and flicked with the turn to square leg
Commentary_short: Shamsi to de Silva, no run

Commentary: full just outside off, and he takes a big stride forward to block. Rolls away to Markram at point
full on off, but Udana steps towards the ball to defend. Ball rolls away to cover
looped up on middle, tapped back to the bowler
Commentary_short: Duminy to de Silva, no run

Commentary: de Silva has bat and pad close together as he comes forward to defend
Commentary_short: Duminy to de Silva, no run

Commentary: someone shouted 'catch it!', but his shot from de Silva clears the infield on the leg side and skims away to the boundary
Commentary_short: Duminy to de Silva, FOUR runs

Commentary: and this one is caught! De Silva is livid with himself. It was a rank long hop from Duminy, and he might have hit it anywhere, but lifts it straight down to Nortje at deep backward square. Soft
Dismissal_text: DM de Silva c Nortje b Duminy 22 (61m 46b 2x4 0x6) SR: 47.82

Commentary: very full, pushed back to the bowler
flicked with the spin into the leg side
a touch short at 93km/h, but it turns in to threaten the stumps before it's tapped to cover
this is a much better length from Shamsi, drawing him forward and testing his defence
googly from Shamsi, and Udana doesn't quite read it as he attempts a sweep
this time he does read the variation, staying deep and pushing defensively to cover. Looks like Miller read it too
nice take from Miller, who shimmies down the leg side to stop a ball spinning in that direction. His footwork isn't entirely convincing, but it's good enough
spinning in, defended by Udana
a neat little drive rolls through the gap at cover
down the track comes Udana, getting right to the pitch and slashing a drive up and over mid off, who is up
dragged down short and wide, but a firm cut is stopped by the cover sweeper
nicely bowled, and Malinga defends from the crease

direct hit! Malinga chipped the ball uppishly and just to the right of Reeza at midwicket. Reeza attacks the ball and fires in a smart throw at the non-striker's end where, shockingly, Malinga hasn't bothered to ground his bat despite being over the line. That is a disappointing way to go. Perhaps he assumed the throw was going to the keeper's end? Whatever the case, thoughtless stuff from Malinga. And excellent awareness from Reeza

driven firmly down the ground, where Markram and Steyn tag-team in the field to stop the boundary. Markram runs the ball down and dives, parrying the ball to Steyn, who knocks it back in. Markram picks it up and fires in the return
nudged into the leg side, with the spin
scooped over cover, Udana lifting a full ball intentionally over the infield. It's not the greatest connection, but it has the legs to beat Phehlukwayo, chasing after it
googly, it's read and guided down through short third man
Udana is forward to smother a full one into the leg side
beaten by the wrong 'un! Udana thrusts his bat forward, but inside the line as the ball spins across him

there's a speculative appeal for lbw as an orthodox delivery spins in to him, beating the inside edge and hitting the pad. The umpire's not interested, but they ask for a review - a little pointlessly, as it turns out, with the ball spinning way down leg

more excitement! Udana tries to come forward to one that spits up at him, spinning in to hit the pad and bouncing away to gully. Closer than the last one, but no dice. Would have been umpire's call on impact
smeared down the ground! Udana continues to show them how it's done, clearing his front leg at a full one and slamming it cleaning and over the sightscreen
and again! He's into the 40s now, stepping back as Nortje digs it in short and hammering a pull flat and hard down to long on, where it hits the boundary marker on the full
out of the ground! Udana is going down swinging. He lines up another short one and swings it clear out of the ground, beyond midwicket, to bring up a maiden ODI fifty
short again from Nortje, with a little nip too at 142km/h, and it's fending through short fine leg for a couple
sprayed down the leg side, and he'll have to bowl this one again
top edged, but safe! Udana swivels awkwardly into a wild pull at a short ball, top edging it up and over the keeper, and fine of fine leg. Some more tag-team fielding saves runs
another bouncer, and it fizzes past Udana's grille as he misses a pull

dip and spin for Shamsi, Rajitha is beaten coming forward, and there's an appeal as he's struck on the pad. Aleem Dar agrees with this one, and raises the finger. It's reviewed, and the replays show no inside edge ... but it's missing the stumps! Too much turn
Rajitha is half forward to nudge the ball into the leg side
spinning down the leg side, and another good stop down there for Miller
Rajitha comes forward, defending into the leg side
nicely done by Rajitha, lunging well forward and keeping the bat and pad close together as he defends
looped up outside off, and a solid forward defensive is the response
beaten outside off! It was the googly, he didn't read it, and groped inside the line as it fizzed past him

tipped over the bar! Udana drove hard and in the air towards du Plessis at mid on, who has some ground to make but leaps and goes one-handed with his right hand. But he can't hold on, and it's more runs
fiercely struck, Udana rocking back and hammering a confident pull out to midwicket
and now he backs away at a slower ball, hacking and missing a cut
into the scoreboard! Udana drills another pull right out of the screws, the ball arcing way over the outfield and slamming straight into the electronic scoreboard
yorker, it's dug out, and a single keeps him the strike
flighted outside off, and he defends
he's into the 70s now!, bending low and deliberately lifting his sweep up and over fine leg to bring up the fifty stand and claim the 10th wicket record partnership for Sri Lanka
this one squirts off the outer half of the bat, rolling to short third man
Rajitha, who has contributed precisely 0 to the partnership, does exactly what he needs to, coming forward to defend solidly
beaten by a googly that hits him on the back leg. There's an appeal, but it pitched outside leg
sharp turn in to him this time, but Rajitha is back and across and jabs his bat down to keep it out
sliced over cover point, Udana making some room and nailing the shot exactly where he aimed to

caught at long off! He lived by the sword, and died by it. Udana looks to take Phehlukwayo on again, lifting an aerial drive at a slower ball down the ground. He hits it well, but not well enough to beat du Plessis down at the boundary, who makes no mistake this time
Dismissal_text: I Udana c du Plessis b Phehlukwayo 78 (67m 57b 7x4 4x6) SR: 136.84

Commentary_short: de Silva to de Kock, no run
de Silva to de Kock, no run

Commentary: it's a little too short, and headed down the leg side, but he gets away with it as de Kock pulls to Rajitha at short fine
Commentary_short: de Silva to de Kock, no run

Commentary: he's forward to drive this time, pinging cover
Commentary_short: de Silva to de Kock, no run

Commentary: tossed up on middle and leg, and it's nudged to mid on
Commentary_short: de Silva to de Kock, no run

Commentary: there's some excitement as Dhananjaya finds turn and bounce to hit de Kock on the thigh ... but the appeal is clipped and there's no harm done
Commentary_short: de Silva to de Kock, no run

Commentary: and there's a little away shape for him first up, Reeza tapping it watchfully to point
Reeza thrusts his hands forward at a full one, the ball taking an inside edge and rolling into the leg side
beaten on the outside edge, Reeza staying back and setting himself for his favoured backfoot punch, but missing the shot
but this one is out of the middle! Malinga offers width, the ball sits up off the track and it's trashed in front of point
Malinga aims a little closer to off stump this time, at 134km/h, and it's defended to point
jaffa! Landing on middle and off, the ball shapes away through the air and off the seam to beat Reeza's defensive poke
speared in from around the stumps, and de Kock meets it with defence
Commentary_short: de Silva to de Kock, no run

Commentary: swept hard through square leg, de Kock fetching a flat delivery from outside off and cracking it through square leg
Commentary_short: de Silva to de Kock, FOUR runs

Commentary: this would have been a blinder! Dhananjaya gets one to grip with a little more flight and de Kock pushes too early at it, popping the ball in the air but seemingly well wide of the bowler. But Dhananjaya went airborne, diving to his right, and got to it too only for the ball to pop out as he came back down to earth
Commentary_short: de Silva to de Kock, no run

Commentary: pushed to cover
Commentary_short: de Silva to de Kock, no run
de Silva to de Kock, no run

Commentary: another sweep, another boundary. De Kock gets across to off and bends down low. Knowing there's no-one in the deep, he deliberately lifts his sweep up and over the infield
Commentary_short: de Silva to de Kock, FOUR runs

Commentary: drifting into the pads, but it's clipped straight to square leg
that's better from Malinga, keeping him honest with a length delivery that curves away towards off stump
whipped off the hip and out to long leg, and they're back for the second
Reeza stands up into a firm punch, but finds mid off
a touch fuller, and this time Reeza drives - but again he finds cover
edged! But does it carry? Thisara Perera is at slip, and the ball dips as it gets to him but it carries, and is put down. Another chance goes begging
Reeza's forward, playing with the spin into the leg side
Commentary_short: de Silva to Hendricks, no run

Commentary: Reeza uses his wrists to pick a gap at midwicket
full toss, and it's slugged in the air to midwicket. De Kock didn't really get hold of it, but there are acres of space out there
Commentary_short: de Silva to de Kock, FOUR runs

Commentary: driven down to long off for an ambled single
Commentary_short: de Silva to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: Reeza hangs back, pushing defensively to cover
Commentary_short: de Silva to Hendricks, no run

Commentary: edged, and this time it's held! Dhananjaya flighted this one up outside off at just 80km/h and Reeza sweeps under it, an edge coming off the toe-end and looping to Thisara at slip, who manages to hold on this time
Dismissal_text: RR Hendricks c NLTC Perera b de Silva 8 (18m 16b 1x4 0x6) SR: 50.00

Commentary: back of a length on middle stump, and worked off his hips to deep backward square
full on leg, and clipped away to the leg side. Mistimed to square leg
length ball on off, and he covers his off stump, before defending towards the off side
drilled! Length ball on off, and he smokes a straight-drive past the diving fielder at mid-on!
length ball, just outside off, and punched square through the off side to point. Fielder gets his fingertips to it, saves the four
length ball, wide outside off, and he pushes forward to drive. Finds cover
Commentary_short: Malinga to de Kock, no run

Commentary: full on off, and angling in. Driven to long-on for a walking single
full from around the wicket. Lands on middle, and pushed back to the bowler
Commentary_short: de Silva to de Kock, no run

Commentary: full on leg, and he goes onto the back foot. Nudged away to square leg
Commentary_short: de Silva to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: length ball, just outside off, and blocked off the back foot
Commentary_short: de Silva to Markram, no run

Commentary: full and wide outside of, and driven inside-out to cover
Commentary_short: de Silva to Markram, no run

Commentary: tossed up just outside off, and whipped away to wide long-on for a single
full on leg, and punched off the back foot to midwicket
back of a length, wide outside leg stump, and he misses the pull. Ball goes through to the keeper

Commentary_short: Malinga to de Kock, no run

Commentary: length ball on leg, and nudged off his waist to deep midwicket. Two fielders give it a chase
full on off, and punched to wide mid-on
full on middle, and he drives with the bat's closed face to mid-on
Commentary_short: Malinga to de Kock, no run

Commentary: full and wide outside off, and he presses forward to drive. Mistimed to cover
Commentary_short: Malinga to de Kock, no run

Commentary: flatter, length ball on off and skidding through. Flat-batted off the back foot to mid-off
Commentary_short: de Silva to Markram, no run

Commentary: full just outside off, and driven with the turn to wide long-on
length ball, wide outside off, and he slaps a cut with the spin to point
Commentary_short: de Silva to de Kock, no run

Commentary: full on middle, from around the wicket. Worked off the front foot to square leg
Commentary_short: de Silva to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: full on leg, and he whips a straight drive to long on for another single. Carbon copy of Markram's previous run
full on middle, and blocked away to the on-side
Commentary_short: de Silva to de Kock, no run

Commentary: length ball on off, and he guides a back-foot cut to third man
length ball, wide outside off, and driven away from his body to cover
Commentary_short: Malinga to de Kock, no run

Commentary: length ball on off, and worked off the back foot to the leg side
full on off, and he shuffles towards the line of the ball, before pushing a drive to mid-off
slower ball, full on middle stump. And defended with the bat's straight face
full on middle, and he crunches an on drive through the leg side. Placed between midwicket and mid-on, and the ball races away for four
length ball on off, and he works this off his hips to square leg. Fielder takes an aim at the bowler's end, but QdK dives in anyway
length ball, outside off and angling further away. Cut away to deep point
length ball, wide outside off, and punched off the back foot to cover
full on middle, and he defends with the straight bat
full just outside off, and he plays a square drive to deep point
length ball, just outside off, and slapped in front of square to deep extra cover
Commentary_short: Udana to de Kock, no run

Commentary: full just outside off, and his attempted cover drive flies off the bat's inside half. Rolls away to midwicket
back of a length on off, and punched off the back foot to cover
angling into his hips, and nudged away - uncomfortably - to square leg
Commentary_short: Rajitha to de Kock, no run

Commentary: length ball on leg, and a leading edge goes to mid-off for a quick run
length ball, just outside off, and he glides this down to third man for a jogging single
length ball on off, and he nudges this back towards the bowler
length ball on leg, and he mistimes a pull to the leg side. Gloved for a single
Commentary_short: Udana to de Kock, no run

Commentary: smoked! Length ball, wide outside off, and he drags a pull to the midwicket boundary!
Commentary_short: Udana to de Kock, FOUR runs

Commentary: length ball on off, and tapped down to md-on
length ball on off, and he carves a cut to deep point
slower ball, length on off, and tapped off the back foot to mid-on for a single
back of a length on middle, and he checks his pull to lift this over square leg!
length ball, wide outside off, and cut away to deep point
full on off, and drilled to mid-on for a quick single
back of a length on leg, and pulled along the ground to deep backward square
length ball, just outside off, and guided to point
back of a length, just outside off, and tapped off the back foot to point
length ball angling in, and punched off the back foot to midwicket
full just outside off, and spinning away. Driven to mid-off
Commentary_short: PHKD Mendis to de Kock, no run

Commentary: full just outside off, and driven away from his body to cover
Commentary_short: PHKD Mendis to de Kock, no run

Commentary: reverse swept! Full just outside off, and he plays the shot past the keeper's left. No third man in place
Commentary_short: PHKD Mendis to de Kock, FOUR runs

Commentary: full just outside off, and pushed with the bat's open face to deep point. They comfortably jog back for two
Commentary_short: PHKD Mendis to de Kock, 2 runs

Commentary: overpitched just outside off, and he crunches a drive to deep extra cover
Commentary_short: PHKD Mendis to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: left-arm spin on middle, and flicked to square leg for a single
length ball, wide outside off, and he stands tall to punch off the front foot past cover. There's protection in the deep though

smart catch! And Markram isn't happy. Length ball on middle, and he tries to chip to the leg side. Leading edge skies the ball, and the fielder at midwicket slides across the ground to complete the dismissal near square leg
Dismissal_text: AK Markram c de Silva b Rajitha 29 (42m 32b 3x4 0x6) SR: 90.62

Commentary: full just outside off, and he tees this straight past the bowler's left! Smacked between Rajitha and mid-on, and that's got four written all over it
Commentary_short: Rajitha to de Kock, FOUR runs

Commentary: full outside off, and he reaches forward to meet the ball on the front foot. Driven, but finds cover
back of a length on middle, and he pulls along the ground to fine leg
back of a length, just outside off, and tapped off the back foot to mid-on
Commentary_short: Rajitha to de Kock, no run

Commentary: length ball on middle, and tapped off the back foot to short midwicket
Commentary_short: PHKD Mendis to du Plessis, 1 run

Commentary: full on leg, and nudged down the ground to mid-on
Commentary_short: PHKD Mendis to de Kock, no run

Commentary: full on off, and pushed inside-out to extra cover
Commentary_short: PHKD Mendis to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: full on off, and pushed away from his body to cover
Commentary_short: PHKD Mendis to du Plessis, no run
PHKD Mendis to du Plessis, no run

Commentary: full toss, wide outside off, and he hammers a square drive to deep extra cover! And drinks
Commentary_short: PHKD Mendis to du Plessis, FOUR runs

Commentary: length ball on middle, and turning into the left-hander. Flicked to short fine leg for a single
Commentary_short: BOP Fernando to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: back of a length, outside off, and turning further away. Flat-bats a mistimed shot to cover
Commentary_short: BOP Fernando to du Plessis, no run

Commentary: length ball on leg, and he drags a pull to deep midwicket
Commentary_short: BOP Fernando to du Plessis, 1 run

Commentary: length ball, just outside off, and he works this off his backfoot to square leg
Commentary_short: BOP Fernando to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: length ball on off, and punched down the ground to long on
Commentary_short: BOP Fernando to du Plessis, 1 run

Commentary: overpitched just outside off, and he toe-ends a drive to the bowler's left
Commentary_short: BOP Fernando to de Kock, no run

Commentary: drags it short on leg stump, pulled off the back foot to deep square leg
Commentary_short: de Silva to du Plessis, 1 run

Commentary: length ball, just outside off, and the attempted back-foot tap comes off the bat's top half. Nearly pops into the hands of the bowler
Commentary_short: de Silva to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: length ball outside leg, and worked off the backfoot to square leg
Commentary_short: de Silva to du Plessis, no run

Commentary: full on leg stump, and tapped back to the bowler
Commentary_short: de Silva to du Plessis, no run

Commentary: full on middle, and he walks down the wicket, before whipping to square leg
Commentary_short: de Silva to du Plessis, no run

Commentary: full on leg, and worked off his pads to deep backward square
Commentary_short: de Silva to du Plessis, 1 run

Commentary: full toss, wide outside off, and he slaps this to deep extra cover. Hits cover's shin before rolling in the deep
Commentary_short: BOP Fernando to du Plessis, 1 run

Commentary: overpitched on middle, and driven gently to long on for a single
Commentary_short: BOP Fernando to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: full toss, very wide outside off, and hammered to deep extra cover. Slight misfield there, and they come back for the second run
Commentary_short: BOP Fernando to du Plessis, 2 runs

Commentary: waist-high full toss on off, and Faf makes no mistake. Clears his front leg, and hammers a six over deep midwicket
Commentary_short: BOP Fernando to du Plessis, SIX runs

Commentary: overpitched wide outside off, and firmly driven to deep extra cover for a single
Commentary_short: BOP Fernando to du Plessis, 1 run

Commentary: length ball, wide outside off and turning further away. Steered to short third man. Fifth-straight fifty-plus score for QdK
Commentary_short: BOP Fernando to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: length ball on off, and cut off the back foot to deep point
Commentary_short: de Silva to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: full on leg, and he misses the defensive shot. Ball hits his pad and rolls away
Commentary_short: de Silva to du Plessis, no run

Commentary: full on leg, and whipped away to deep backward square
Commentary_short: de Silva to du Plessis, 1 run

Commentary: straight to mid on! A tame end for such a solid innings. Full on off, and he tries to drag this between midwicket and mid-on, but plays it too straight
Commentary_short: de Silva to de Kock, OUT
Dismissal_text: Q de Kock c Tharanga b de Silva 51 (83m 57b 6x4 0x6) SR: 89.47

Commentary: speared in at off stump, 91km/h, and it's pushed to cover off the front foot
Commentary_short: de Silva to Miller, no run

Commentary: straighter this time, and it's pushed back to the bowler
Commentary_short: de Silva to Miller, no run

Commentary: Rajitha starts just short of a length outside off, du Plessis placing the ball firmly to mid off
Commentary_short: Rajitha to du Plessis, no run

Commentary: same ball, same shot, and again there's no run to be had
Commentary_short: Rajitha to du Plessis, no run

Commentary: Rajitha keeps on hitting that length outside off, bowling to his field, and du Plessis gives cover / mid off more work
Commentary_short: Rajitha to du Plessis, no run

Commentary: dug in short this time, the ball bursting past du Plessis' pull on the way through to the keeper. Du Plessis asks the square leg umpire about the height
Commentary_short: Rajitha to du Plessis, no run

Commentary: too short again, but he's over-egged this one and it balloons way over the batsman. 'Two for the over' is the signal from Aleem Dar
finally he threads the gap! Du Plessis punches yet again into the off side as Rajitha reverts to length, but this time the placement is perfect and right between the diving fielders
Commentary_short: Rajitha to du Plessis, FOUR runs

Commentary: Rajitha pulls his length back a shade, and it's not quite short enough for du Plessis' pull
Commentary_short: Rajitha to du Plessis, no run

Commentary: Miller pokes a little uncertainly at a flat delivery outside off and the ball goes nowhere
Commentary_short: de Silva to Miller, no run

Commentary: slightly too short, and it's muscled out into the deep on the leg side
a hint of spin, and Miller is a little squared up but keeps it out well enough
Commentary_short: de Silva to Miller, no run

Commentary: punched out through cover for a single
Dhananjaya comes round the stumps, and du Plessis' drive is stopped by a long barrier at cover
Commentary_short: de Silva to du Plessis, no run

Commentary: Faf stays deep this time, flicking with the spin out to deep square to keep the strike
Commentary_short: de Silva to du Plessis, 1 run

Commentary: nicely bowled by Rajitha, who gets it to tail in at the stumps, testing du Plessis' defence
Commentary_short: Rajitha to du Plessis, no run

Commentary: short, and it's pulled hard out to deep square where Tharanga dives to keep them to two
du Plessis is ready and waiting on the back foot as Rajitha digs it in, thundering a powerful pull in the air over midwicket
Commentary_short: Rajitha to du Plessis, FOUR runs

Commentary: through cover this time, and it's an even better stroke. Rajitha over-compensates, and du Plessis leans into a muscular drive that sends the ball purring through cover
Commentary_short: Rajitha to du Plessis, FOUR runs

Commentary: Faf hops and tucks a single off the hip
full, and it's flicked off the pads down to fine leg
elegantly done! This has flown clean out of the ground, but it was nothing more than a well-timed, checked loft from Miller. Tremendous strength in those arms. Must be a good bat too
Commentary_short: de Silva to Miller, SIX runs

Commentary: Dhananjaya holds this one back, giving it a little more air, and Miller is forward to defend
Commentary_short: de Silva to Miller, no run

Commentary: pushed down the leg side, but Miller can't make anything out of it
Commentary_short: de Silva to Miller, no run

Commentary: speared in flat, outside off, and it's pushed to point
Commentary_short: de Silva to Miller, no run

Commentary: not much flight on this one either, and Miller drives to cover
Commentary_short: de Silva to Miller, no run

Commentary: pushed through at 95km/h, Miller working to mid on
Commentary_short: de Silva to Miller, no run

Commentary: du Plessis comes forward and drives to cover
Commentary_short: PHKD Mendis to du Plessis, no run

Commentary: left-arm spin once again, and it's slightly short but turns big to thwart du Plessis' pull
Commentary_short: PHKD Mendis to du Plessis, no run

Commentary: punched out through cover, uppishly but straight through the gap
Commentary_short: PHKD Mendis to du Plessis, 1 run

Commentary: right-arm offspin for the left-hander, who opens the face on a drive to find a single behind point
full toss, and du Plessis shuffles down to make it even fuller, slamming a drive through the gap at cover
Commentary_short: PHKD Mendis to du Plessis, FOUR runs

Commentary: Faf waits deep in the crease, nurdling off the pads to keep the strike
Commentary_short: PHKD Mendis to du Plessis, 1 run

Commentary: chipped straight to short midwicket! Du Plessis falls against the run of play, dancing down the track and whipping into the leg side - but in the air and straight into the lap of the Priyamal in that position
Commentary_short: de Silva to du Plessis, OUT
Dismissal_text: F du Plessis c PARP Perera b de Silva 43 (45m 38b 5x4 1x6) SR: 113.15

Commentary: dead-batted close in on the off side
Commentary_short: de Silva to Duminy, no run

Commentary: pushed through cover, and a quick single gets him off the mark
full, and it's driven hard but straight back to the bowler
Commentary_short: de Silva to Miller, no run

Commentary: Miller uses his feet and finds a gap at cover for one
timing and placement! Duminy hops back and across, placing his cut behind point to bring up the 150
Commentary_short: de Silva to Duminy, FOUR runs

Commentary: a touch too short, and Millers punches hard out to the cover sweeper
short, wide and spinning even further away. This would have been called wide, had Duminy not placed it through the gap at cover
a neat little drive to long off turns the strike over
Duminy flings his hands through a drive, but finds extra cover
Commentary_short: PHKD Mendis to Duminy, no run

Commentary: onto the grass banks! It was a long hop, and Duminy dealt with it accordingly. He's back
Commentary_short: PHKD Mendis to Duminy, SIX runs

Commentary: slapped through cover, it's much too full and he nails the drive right in the gap. JP's straight into his groove, and it's as if he was never gone
Commentary_short: PHKD Mendis to Duminy, FOUR runs

Commentary: and he hits a length to start, Miller defending in front of his stumps
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to Miller, no run

Commentary: just short of a good length, and it's tucked back to the bowler
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to Miller, no run

Commentary: fuller this time, and Miller finds a driver out to the sweeper

Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to Duminy, no run

Commentary: flicked off the pads, just the single though
Miller steps into a checked on drive, and there's a single out to long on
he comes around the stumps, Miller chopping a single down to third man off a length delivery
helped on its way, Duminy getting inside the line and placing the ball down to the boundary with a controlled paddle-pull
and he turns the strike back over with a guide to third man
fuller this time, and angled in at off stump, Miller keeping it out with a push to cover
Miller looks for a drop-and-run single, but a diving gully fielder sends him home
Miller uses the angle to work a single to fine leg, keeping the strike
this time the quick single is on, Miller making an early call and JP sprinting through
glanced off middle and leg, and a single into the deep
Miller whips across a length delivery, but he can't beat midwicket
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to Miller, no run

Commentary: Miller fishes outside off, and there's a yelp of excitement as ball passes bat, but he wasn't close to it
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to Miller, no run

Commentary: short again, but straighter this time and it's slugged out to deep midwicket
slashed down to third man, where Rajitha cleans up
Duminy chops a cut hard into the ground, the ball bouncing through to the keeper
this time it's the drive that's bottom edged, and Miller sends Duminy back as he wanders out looking for a run
crisply driven, Duminy leaning across into languid stroke. Left handers just do it better
dead-batted close in on the off side
Duminy slashes a drive past a diving gully fielder, and there's room for a second as it's a little square of third man
slung down from over the wicket, and aimed right at middle. Duminy's defence holds firm
Miller now shows his class, following Duminy's lead and hammering a checked drive past mid off
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to Miller, FOUR runs

Commentary: angled down to third man, and South Africa need just two runs to win
chopped down to gully, no run there
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to Duminy, no run

Commentary: Duminy drives to mid off, and takes the fielder on for a quick single. Kamindu is the fielder, and he throws left handed but it goes wide. Could have been close, had he hit
doesn't make a difference though as the ball comes off Miller's pad and dribbles into the leg side to bring the match to an end
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to Miller, 1 leg bye
